abstract: Shareholders of WCI Communities, a struggling homebuilder, elected the billionaire Carl C. Icahn to the board on Thursday, more than four months after management rejected his $22-per-share takeover bid.
lead_paragraph: Shareholders of WCI Communities, a struggling homebuilder, elected the billionaire Carl C. Icahn to the board on Thursday, more than four months after management rejected his $22-per-share takeover bid.

headline.main: WCI Shareholders Elect Icahn to Board
